title: Honor 5 taken away?
body: I got reported by trolls and got my honor 5 taken away and i haven't been able to go back up and the reason i was chat banned was because i was explaining something to him and he reported me for harassment when he was doing the same thing after match and he did not get a punishment... Is this something that can be fixed or at least take me back to honor 2 or 3 OR is this a situation that riot cant do a thing about it?

replies.body: If you think this is something that really deserves a second look, feel free to hit up our player behavior agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). While some of the things you said could have been taken rather offensively, you're always welcome to reach out to us for a second look or more context.
